title: Otrai Devathai Lyrics Vallavanukku Pullum Aayudham Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Otrai Devathai
Singer(s): Karthik
Movie: Vallavanukku Pullum Aayudham
Music: Siddharth Vipin
Lyricist: Madhan Karky

Mannengum sendru thaedi paaru
vinnengum aeri thaedi paaru
ottrai dhevadhai yaaradaa
sattre ivalai paarada. (2)

Ival paarvai minsaaram
ival vaarthai reengaaram
idhal virikkum, ival sirippum
un vazhvin varam. (2)

Sudithaarin thottathukkul
ottrai thaavani.
Tamil mattum pesum
indha thattai paaru nee.

azhagigal pookkum ulagathile
ottrai dhevadhai yaaradaa
sattre ivalai paarada.

Ival paarvai minsaaram
ival vaarthai reengaaram
idhal virikkum, ival sirippum
un vazhvin varam. (2)

Thanpol ulla thoorigal onril
vannam aezhum theettiduvaal.
Nenjil konda aasaigal ellaam
kaagitham meley kaattiduvaal.

Nilam neer thee vaan kaattrai ellaam
viral aindhaale kootti vandhaal.

Ival kai korthu
indha boomi nee paarthaal
un vazhvil vannam pookkum.

Ival paarvai minsaaram
ival vaarthai reengaaram
idhal virikkum, ival sirippum
un vazhvin varam. (2)
